channel.title: Comments on: Broken down and wet but good

item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>Glad you are enjoying your holiday, sounds like the trip was a bit of a disaster not to worry I've experienced many occassions sitting by the side of the A14 waiting for punctures to be repaired on dads old buses, but not anymore as he has new ones!!!!!!<br/>I'm sure some people would love to see his website (as above not plugging really!!!!!)<br/>See you soon<br/>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Glad you are enjoying your holiday, sounds like the trip was a bit of a disaster not to worry I’ve experienced many occassions sitting by the side of the A14 waiting for punctures to be repaired on dads old buses, but not anymore as he has new ones!!!!!!
I’m sure some people would love to see his website (as above not plugging really!!!!!)
See you soon
Matt
